extendedInfo.description: Nation Wide Bar Crawl - Your destination for the best in drinking, nightlife, bars and social networking!Download this app to find the most current local happy hour specials for your city, arrange and participate in bar crawls with your friends, and earn points by tagging images of you and your friends at the bar.

reviews.title: Didn\'t load
reviews.comment: Every time I clicked a city it started back at the home page
reviews.author: Sam Silvershein

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Great app..... convenient when looking for a local bar and fun feature creating the crawls
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for happy hour!
reviews.comment: This app is awesome for finding cool places to drink after work. The list of bars and pubs is extensive and the drinks on tap list makes it easy to find what you\'re looking for. The social network built makes it easy to invite your friends for drinks with you. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool App
reviews.comment: This App has some awesome features I can actually use, it shows drink specials all over multiple cities any day of the week.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I live in Eugene, OR. And this app killed it on giving bar advice and information. Great drink recipes and amazing bar references. Perfect app! Love it!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool!
reviews.comment: I just upgraded today to new version and the new look is awesome. Way more user friendly and stoked to go on a crawl this weekend with all my old HS buddies coming in town for the holiday!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: we out here tryna function!
reviews.comment: This is a great app that allows you to have a good, without the hassle. It includes a lot of nice features. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aww Yeaa
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. Easy to use and works great organizing bar crawls with all your drinking buddies!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool idea
reviews.comment: I can\'t wait until more of my friends get this app. I\'m recommending it to everyone I know.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is the greatest bar app ever written, bar none.
reviews.author: Brian Yarzab

reviews.title: 5 stars by far
reviews.comment: Great time taking this to the bar!
reviews.author: Brandon Schwoch
